mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PY_PCR_CRS_CRT_SISZ2_SI5Y( UUID, CRT_TIME, CRT_USER, TRN_ID, TIMES_RECENTLY12_MONTHS, TIMES_RECENTLY24_MONTHS, TIMES_RECENTLY36_MONTHS, TIMES_RECENTLY48_MONTHS, TIMES_RECENTLY60_MONTHS, ST_RECENTLY60_MONTHS, UC_RECENTLY60_MONTHS, APP_ID ) VALUES( sys_guid(), sysdate, #{crtUser}, #{trnId}, #{timesRecently12Months}, #{timesRecently24Months}, #{timesRecently36Months}, #{timesRecently48Months}, #{timesRecently60Months}, #{stRecently60Months}, #{ucRecently60Months}, #{appId} )
